dataList.content: A hallway within the LCE.
The child who's been analyzing the amassed data suddenly senses two sets of eyes intensely focused on her back. This was unusual.
She briefly turned around and realized that the source of the intense gazing was their new junior researcher, who'd joined just yesterday.
What could possibly be the reason for this staring, she wondered. Especially when he was already with another senior researcher.
She could not imagine why, until the pair began talking.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Huh, I thought all E.G.O gear worn by the LCE looked ridiculous, but...

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: ... the one she's wearing looks pretty clean. It almost looks workshop-made.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Perhaps you found the E.G.O gears of the LCE odd, for unlike the gears of Lobotomy Corporation, various inhuman features such as tails or scales may sprout on their users.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Yet... hold not so much envy in your heart for her gear, for many failed to find it within themselves to don it.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Whaat! But that E.G.O gear looks so cool!

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: ... For it may go... 'boom'.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Shall it be during battle, or during study, one cannot say. Perhaps it may erupt... even now.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: W-wait, then...
The child, unable to bear this any longer, paused and turned around.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Please refrain from sharing rumors of ambiguous sources to new hires, Yi Sang.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: ... C'mon, were you trying to prank me again?

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: I had wondered for what cause you could possibly have for bringing someone else along... But it does not seem to have been for any productive purpose.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Ha ha...

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Well. He did not lie, to be precise. It is indeed true that this E.G.O gear is prone to reactions of explosive nature.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Yet, the safety trials have already been completed regarding such risks. There is no reason to fear.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Ugh, I don't know. I don't think I'd ever feel safe if I had to wear that.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Isn't it too risky?

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: ... Most subjects of study here at LCE are fraught with risks of unknown natures. One cannot hope to accomplish anything should they flee before high-risk research projects.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Researchers must endeavor to be able to explain the fundamentals of their operations, and thus face what dangers may lie ahead to establish conclusions.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: You would do well to remember that, if your aim is to accomplish anything here at the LCE through research.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: ... That's true. Whatever you guys are dealing with here at the LCE, the Abnormalities, the Distortions are... I simply haven't seen or heard of anything like them anywhere else.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: I... I'll remember that.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Be not so harsh on him, for it has been but two days since his onboarding.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Yi Sang, perhaps you should adjust your attunement level with that E.G.O.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Ahm. It may be that, in the process of welcoming a promising junior researcher, I have allowed my mischievousness to get out of hand.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Yes. Well. Then I will excuse myself.
She must have had nothing more to say.
Because she whipped around and began walking away, as though her business here was concluded. But the researcher stopped her in her steps.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Ah. Are you... bound for the Peccatula Laboratory, by any chance?

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Yes. I am to participate in a combat capacity test.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Then will you, perhaps, bring my junior with you for a field trip? He is yet to be assigned a task, and I find him ill prepared to join me for an Abnormality management work.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Very well.
It's unusual for researchers of most companies to be involved in any degree of combat...
This seemed to have piqued the junior researcher's interest.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Woah... combat tests?

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Yes. It guarantees results, should it succeed. Repression Work efficiency. Abnormality or Distortion containment breach suppression efficiency. Not to mention the various additional data that can be procured from engaging them in combat.
But the junior researcher didn't have much time to ask his questions, as they arrived at the laboratory within minutes.
The child walked into the laboratory alone as the junior researcher watched through the glass window.
The Peccatula in there surrounded the child as though they were drawn by something.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Y-you're gonna be okay, right?

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: No variables of any risk have been observed.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Raising attunement level. Resonating.
The child soared toward the ceiling, making some distance between herself and the gathering Peccatula.
This must've been made possible thanks to her assimilation rate—also known here as attunement rate.
Normally, this wouldn't have been possible even with a high attunement rate, but the LCE E.G.O were different.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Woah, wait. Winged E.G.Os can fly? I thought they were just for show?!

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Not necessarily. Most Winged E.G.O gears do not have flight capabilities.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Indeed, it is true that, as long as high attunement level can be maintained, it can utilize the source Abnormality's idiosyncrasies with greater flexibility compared to Lobotomy Corporation E.G.O.
By gaining a deep understanding of the Abnormality, and by maintaining, even for a brief moment, empathy for it...
... she was able to temporarily raise her attunement level by her own volition.
Perhaps, in a way, it is closer to the usage of actual E.G.O rather than E.G.O gears of Lobotomy Corporation.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: I see. So I should try my best to raise my attunement levels.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Maybe so, but over-investment is discouraged.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Deeper studies and obsession may cause the wearer to be consumed by the E.G.O.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Like so.
The child's moves began to grow increasingly flashy as she burns the Peccatula away one by one.
Spreading embers everywhere... just like the Abnormality, Ardor Blossom Moth.
That's when a sudden crackling noise echoed through the laboratory.
It wasn't anything special, considering that the entire chamber was practically on fire...
... but the junior researcher couldn't help but flinch out of fear, given what the senior researcher from earlier had told him.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: A-are you about to blow?

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Were I to raise the attunement level further, yes. I would explode.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: But I don't intend to, of course. There is still much that must be studied.
Just as that bizarre heat began to coalesce around her, the child closed her eyes as though she was emptying her thoughts. And...
... the flames were extinguished. The burning wings, the fire that had traced the path of her weapon... all gone.
Just as the experiment was over, the researcher ran up to the child, mesmerized.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: That was awesome. Crazy how you could so freely control your attunement to the E.G.O just like that.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Think I can be a researcher like you, Ms. Faust?

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: It is inadvisable to do so, however. Though it may appear as though the attunement levels were freely controlled...

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: ... not even Faust may be free from the effects of corrosion.
It was indeed the child's natural disposition to welcome risks in pursuit of knowledge.
However, this child here is more extreme than others, given that she is affected by the E.G.O.
That is why this child does not wish...
... for this junior researcher to walk the same path as she does.

dataList.title: LCE Research Team
dataList.content: Always exercise utmost caution when raising attunement levels. Especially when you are in the source Abnormality's immediate presence.
Watching the researcher nod vigorously, the child began cleaning up the testing chamber.
So she failed to notice a look of ominous passion in the researcher's eyes.
E.G.O. And attunement to the Abnormality.
Failing to see the misfortune that the burning embers of his passion will one day spark.
